name: appname_visibility
objective: Check that the name of the application in focus is visible
description: The name of the application should be visible in the gnome status bar of the desktop when the application is in the foreground.

steps.description: launch an application which doesn't open a fullscreen window (ex: gnome-terminal, calculator...)
steps.expected: the application name must appear in the top bar, on the right of the "Applications" button

author: sdx

name: background_visibility
objective: Check that the background is visible when the application is in the foreground
description: The background of the desktop must be visible when the application is in focus, unless the application is in full screen.

steps.description: launch an application which doesn't open a fullscreen window (ex: gnome-terminal, calculator...)
steps.expected: the application window must have the focus
the background of the desktop must be visible

author: sdx
